arabic.title: donyeti etghayaret (دنيتي اتغيرت)
text: دنيتي اتغيرت من يوم ما شفت عنيك انا
دنيتي اتغيرت من يوم لقاك وانا مش انا
دنيتي اتغيرت من نظرة واحدة حنينة
انا مش عارف مالي عمال افكر فيك
واللي مغير حالي كلمة قالتها عنيك
ولا بتغيب عن عيني ف بالي صاحي وبحلم بيك
انا لا هقول حبيتك ولا راح اقول بهواك
بس هسيبلك قلبي يتكلم وياك
وهو يقولك ع اللي انا حاسس بيه من يوم لقاك

english.title: my life has changed
text: my life has changed since the day I saw your eyes
my life has changed since the day I met you, I'm not me
my life has changed from one tender look
I don't know what's wrong with me,I keep thinking of you
and what have changed my state is a word that your eyes said
and you never go far from my eye,on my mind,
I'm awake and dreaming about you
I wont say I loved you,neither I will say I'm adoring you
I'm just going to leave my heart to talk to you
and it will tell you
how I've been feeling since the day I met you
my life has changed since the day I saw your eyes
my life has changed since the day I met you, I'm not me
my life has changed from one tender look

arabic.title: آن الأوان
text: أن الأوان نرجع تانى
وكفايه حلم وعمر ضايع فى البعاد
وحياة عينيك استنانى
والليله قلبى ايوة جايلك فى الميعاد

english.title: Now
text: Now we will return,
The period we were far and dreaming of each other is enough(and should finish),
I swear you to your eyes that wait for me,
And tonight my heart yes will bring you back.
Soul of my heart
My heart is sure about you,
From long ago my heart
Was being kind to you and eager.
When you are away from me,
I'm afraid of losing you,
And the whole life will be all distance and breakaway,
From long ago my hear was filled with eagerness,
I'm afraid that my heart melts when I meet you,
I remember the day you left,
I will bring you back and start the relationship with you.

arabic.title: أبعد تيجيني
text: ابعد تجينى
اجى تبعد عنى
هو انت مالك؟
ايه اللى جرالك؟
لو كده هنقضيها
ارحمنى
وانا اروح لحالى
وتروح لحالك
مش ناقصه حيره
مش طالبه نحزن
الحزن شيله لحاجه كبيره
لو ناوى تيجى
اهلا وسهلا
مش ناوى يبقى نفضها سيره
انتي اشترتني؟
ولا انت فاكر
علشان بحبك توقف حياتي؟
لا يا حبيبي
ما بقتش قادر
اصبر و احايل
واقول واهاتي

english.title: I Go Away
text: I go away, you come closer
I come closer, you go away
what's wrong with you
what happened to you
If we're going to keep like this, mecy me (leave me)
and I'll go in my way
and you go in your way
it doesn't need to be confused
neither demanding for grief
Leace grief for other important things
If you intend to come
You're welcomed
If not, then let's leave each other
Have you bought me!!
Or may be you think
if I love you, then my life halts!
No my love, I'm not able to
be any more patient, getting around, talking or saying Ah

english.title: The most beautiful day
text: Hey! wait a minute
You make me crazy, find me a way
And make me a favor! stop worrying, stop fear
Your eyes saying that you are shy, but from who?
I can't describe what has happened to me
A new strong feeling for me
let's be clear, there's a difference between two things
between me when i'm normal and calm and between me when i'm in love
From who are you shy?
It didn't take me so long
An angel in front of me, i don't see humans
What a day! the day you came close to me
That's what i was waiting for years
Hey! wait a minute
You make me crazy, find me a way
And make me a favor stop worrying, stop fear
Your eyes saying that you are shy, but from who?
Ask your heart, ask your eye
And don't say, it's between me and you
There're somethings can be said and somethings are better when it's imagination
More than you wish and not to come in your mind
When, where and how i forgot?
I never deny my feelings
It's my destiny to meet you and it's my destiny to be with you
You don't have to say what inside you
From who are you shy?
It didn't take me so long
An angel in front of me, i don't see humans
What a day! the day you came close to me
That's what i was waiting for years
Hey! wait a minute
You make me crazy, find me a way
And make me a favor! stop worrying, stop fear
Your eyes saying that you are shy, but from who?

english.title: Here I Am Melting
text: From the first day, my love
From the first day of my life I loved you
And the last day, my lovr
And to the last day of my life I will still love you
And never in my life did I believe that my heart would be confused
And I'd be up all night with my moon alone all night and day
And here I am melting
My love, melting
And my eyes melt
And I love you
From the first day..
to the last day..
of my life I will still love you
Before you there was no passion
Nor after you will there be passion
That makes me say, "my darling"
That makes me say "my darling"
The most beautiful talk is that of your eyes which make me..
get lost in the ocean of your love
After the cold my location had..
Drowned with you all at once.

text: اعرفه الا اعرفه

عيشت سنين في هواه وحكايته خدت مني راقات
فات كل ده وبتسالوني

كله الا انا ده احنا اتخلقنا لبعضنا
كنت خلاص هنساه مع اني لسه بحن ساعات
عيشت سنين في هواه وحكايته خدت مني راقات
فات كل ده وبتسالوني

english.title: You Know her ?
text: You know her ? don't ask me that , whom else in that world can describe her ? don't ask me that , I am just worried to blush her .
You know her ? don't ask me that , whom else in that world can describe her ? don't ask me that , I am just worried to blush her .
I was about to forget her , though I sometimes I feel with nostalgia . I lived years loving her , her story took from me a lot of time .
All that time have passed and you still ask you know her ?
You know her ? don't ask me that , whom else in that world can describe her ? don't ask me that , I am just worried to blush her .
Not me , everyone except me , I can't forget a relation lived for few years . everyone except me , we were created for each .

arabic.title: أكتر من الدنيا
text: انا اكتر من الدنيا
انا بحبك
وغيرك انت ماليش
انا لو تبعد ثانية
انا فى بعدك
حبيبى صعب اعيش
كنت بخاف من الحب وسيرته
كنت عامله الف حساب
اللى يقوللي بلاش من حيرته
واللى يقوللى نار وعذاب
هو دا قلبى
وهو دا حالى
لما كنت بعيد
اه
واما عيونك ندهت عينى
قلبى فى ثانية حس هواك
لو بايديا ارجع بسنينى
عمرى بحاله يبقى معاك
نفسى اعيش طول مانت معايا
عمر تانى جديد
انا دلوقتى بعيش فى الجنة
ايوة حياتى اجمل بيك
قبل ما اقول او حتى اتمنى
اللى بحبه بالاقيه فيك
ياللى معشتش يوم من قبلك
مش هعيش بعديك
عمر ماقبلك حد وصلى
عشتوقلبى باب مقفول
انت عرفت ازاى تدخلى
دق القلب ليك على طول
ويظهر اني مكنتش عارف
انى مستنيك

english.title: More Than The World
text: I love you more than all of the world, I love you and theres no one else
If your away for one second, My love when your away it's hard for me to live
I was afraid of love.. I always taken thousands of precautions
Some tell me stay away from the confusion others say theres much suffering and hurt
That was my heart, and how I was when you were away
And when your eyes caught my eyes, my heart felt you in a second
If I went back in time, my life would have been with you
I wish to live as long as your with me, more than 1 life
I am living now in heaven, yes my life with you is better
before I say or even wish, what I love I find in her
I havent lived a day before you, I wont live after you
No one before you have gotten to me..I lived..
with a closed heart...how did you know how to come in my heart
My heart beated for you forever
It looks like I didnt know that I was waiting for you

arabic.title: أم الدنيا
text: ولا أي كلام
ولا أي كلام في أغاني اتقال في حبيبتى وكفىي
دانا مصر حبيبتي
دانا مصر حبيبتي في كفة وكل الدنيا في كفة
ولا أي كلام
ولا أي كلام في أغاني اتقال في حبيبتى وكفىي
دانا مصر حبيبتي
دانا مصر حبيبتي في كفة وكل الدنيا في كفة
أم الدنيا مين
ولا في زيها فين
بلدي في حبابي العين
لأ وأقرب من كده
دى بلد عم نجيب
زويل وسومه والعندليب
داليدا وبليغ والخطيب
وناس كتير جامدين كده
ناسها ولاد اصول من دمي دول تربية ايديهم
ومنين ما بروح بقول أنا أهلي دول وبتباهى بيهم
وأنا مطمن طول ما أنا في ضهري دول وبتحامى فيهم

مصر بحبها
بلدي و اللي يمسّها

english.title: Mother of the whole world
text: All the words
All the words that had been ever sung were never enough to describe my beloved one.
My beloved Egypt is in one side
My beloved Egypt is in one side and the rest of the world is in the other one 1 .
Words
Words are being sung have never been enough to describe my beloved one.
My beloved Egypt is in one side
My beloved Egypt is in one side and the rest of the world is in the other one .
Who is the mother of the whole world2 ?
Who else can be just like her3 ?
My homeland is saved in the ball of my eyes.
No, she is even closer than this.
She is the land of Uncle Naguib4,
Zewail5, Soma6, El-Andaleeb7,
Dalida8, Baligh9, El-Khatib10
And other great people like them.
Her people are real noble gentlemen who brought me up, and with whom I share the same blood.
Wherever I go I keep saying proudly "Those are my folk."
And I feel safe as long as I'm under their protection and as long as they are supporting me .
Her people are real noble gentlemen who brought me up, and with whom I share the same blood.
Wherever I go I keep saying proudly "Those are my folk."
And I feel safe as long as I'm under their protection and as long as they are supporting me .
The land of Omar Sharif11,
The funny Adel Imam12,
The well-known Hassan Shehata13
What would've been better ?
Egypt, I love her.
My country. If anybody has ever thought to harm her
I'd have bury him14, and he would have been already finished
who thinks otherwise.
Who is the mother of the whole world ?
Who else can be just like her ?
My homeland is saved in the ball of my eyes.
No, she is even closer than this.
She is the land of Uncle Naguib,
Zewail, Soma, El-Andaleeb,
Dalida, Baligh, El-Khatib
And other great people like them.

english.title: Um el dunia = mother of the world ( Egypt )
text: there're no words .... there're no words has been said in any song about my lover and was enough.
Egypt is my lover ... Egypt is my lover in one hand and all the world is on the other .
who's the mother of the world ?? ... or where you can find like it ??
my country is in the inside of my eye ... and even closer
the home of "am Nageeb" " Zowel" and " Soma" and " Al-Andaleeb"
"Dalida" and " baleegh" and " Al-Khateeb"
and so many other great people
its people is very good people. they are from my blood ( we have same blood )
where ever i go i say those are my family and i show off of them
and as long as those are behind my back i feel good
and iam protected by them
the country of " Omar el shereef" and the funny "Adel Emam"
the well known " Hasan Shehata" ... what's better than this ??
Egypt, i love it ... my country and whoever touche it ( who think badly a bout it )  i would eat him by my teeth, and whoever thinks unlike that is done

arabic.title: أنا لو أذيته
text: انا لو اذيته كان عمل لى
زياده عن كدا ايه؟
بالعكس عمرى ماخدت منه
نص اللى انا بديه
كان عايز يموتنى
يعنى يرتاح وانا مجروح
دا ماشافش غير حنية منى
ماشافش غير الخير
وانا لو قاتله حد
اسهل من كدا بكتير
خايف لايعرف قيمة
اللى ف ايده لما يروح
عموما يالا مش فارقة
ومش خسران
علشان اعرف دا دلوقتى
انا الكسبان
دا يوم بدرى يريحنى
وانا بنسى
ومش يمكن لو انا كملت
اعيش ندمان
لو غلطة منى مين يقولى
انا طب غلطت ف ايه؟
طبيعى لما تحب حد
تكون مآمن ليه
قصر الكلام
هيفيد بايه
خلاص كلامي عليه؟
زمانه رتب كل حاجة
وعاش حياته خلاص
مش فارقة عنده
اى عشرة بيننا ولا احساس
وانا مش هوقف يوم حياتى
الدنيا مليانة ناس

english.title: if i hurted him
text: if i have hurted him he would do more than this to me
in contrary,i've never taken from him the half of what i've given him
he wanted to kill me ,so he meant to take a rest while i'm wounded
althogh he has never seen any affection but from me ,nothing but goodness frome me
if i killed it would be so much easier than this

generally i don't care and i'm not a loser
because now i'm the winner
soon the day comes to confort me and i'll forget

it's natural that when you love someone you trust him
Abbreviate,what will be the use of talking ,it's ovr now
he probably arranged everything and live his life
it doesn't matter for him what we used to have
and i will never stop my life ,the world is full of people

arabic.title: أنت العظيم
text: يا غفار يا تواب يا عالم باللى جوة فى
قلبى قبل ما اقول علية
يا غفار يا تواب اغفرلى كل غلطة وكل ذنب
وقعت فية
يارب انا عبدك انا مليش بعدك
بلجا اليك منا املى فيك
وانت الرحيم مهما يكون ذنبى
اغفرلى ياربى مانتا الرقيب وانت الحسيب
وانت العظيم
انت العظيم

english.title: You are Al-Azeem
text: O,Ghaffar1, O, Tawwaab2, O, you know what do I have in may hearts even before saying it out.
O, Ghaffar, O, Tawwaab, forgive every single mistake and every single sin I've ever committed
O, Lord, I'm your servant. I have no other (support) but you
I always resort to you, as all my hopes lie on you
And you are Al-Rahim3, no matter how huge was my sin
Forgive me, My lord. You are Al-Raqib4, You are Al-Hasib5
And you are Al-Azeem6
You are Al-Azeem

english.title: You Are The Great
text: Oh, Much-Forgiving God, oh, Ever-Relenting God, you know of what lies
inside of my heart before I even say it
Oh, Much-Forgiving God, oh, Ever-Relenting God, forgive my every mistake and every sin
that I committed
Oh God, I am your servant, I have no one but you
I resort to seeking You, You are my hope
You are The Exceedingly Merciful no matter how big my sin is
Forgive me, oh God, You are The Watchful and The Bringer of Judgment
And You are The Great
You are The Great

arabic.title: أول مره
text: قبل ما أشوفك يوم قدامي
كانت الدنيا بتيجي عليا وتكسر نفسي
كان فيه بيني وبين أحلامي
مليون سد بيفصل بيننا وحاجز نفسي
من اللحظة دي بقيتي معاية
وأنا مش حقبل أشوفك خايفة
والجاي في حياتك وياية
فيه حاجات تانية أكيد مختلفة
انت الضحكة الحلوة في دنيا
ما بتضحكليش غير بالصدفة
لو حسيت بالبرد في ثانية
لما عينيك تحضنّي أنا بدفا
لو نجمة بعيدة هجيبهالك
هتكون بين ايدك في ثواني
احلمي باللي حيجي في بالك
عالم قلبي ده عالم ثاني
أول مرة بشوف الدنيا بمليون لون
لهفة وحب وشوق وسعادة، أمل وجنون
ده الحب اللي أنا قلبي سنين كان مستنيه
أنا مش خايفة
وأنا مش خايف
وهنخاف ليه؟
أول مرة بشوف الدنيا بمليون لون
لهفة وحب وشوق وسعادة، أمل وجنون

english.title: The First Time
text: Before I saw you one day before me
the world was harsh on me and broke my spirits
There stood between me and my dreams
a million dams separating us and a psychological barrier
From this moment you are now with me
And I won't accept to see you scared
And what will come of your life with me
has many other different things for sure
You are the beautiful laugh in a world
that occasionally smiles upon me
If I felt cold for a second
When your eyes hug me, I feel warm
If there's a far star, I'll get it to you
It will be in your hands in seconds
Dream of whatever comes to your mind
The world of my heart is another world
For the first time I see the world in a million colors
longing, love, passion and happiness, hope and madness
This is the love that I and my heart waited for for years
I am not scared
And I am not scared
And why would we be scared?
For the first time I see the world in a million colors
longing, love, passion and happiness, hope and madness

arabic.title: إمسك في حلمك
text: كل خطوة نخدها نحلم بخطوة تانية
بنقرب لبكرة ديماً في كل ثانية
والجاي في حياتنا احنا
نبيه بإيدينا
كل حلم كبير بتبقا بدايته فكرة
ناسيين الي فات وديماً باصين لبكرة
ومفيش حاجة مستحيلة
تقدر علينا
الجاي في  حياتك انت عارفه وراسمه
ده لكل واحد فيه حلم مكتوب بإسمه
كل الحكاية ومافيها
نتعب شوية
اه امسك في حلمك وخليك وراه
كلمة ده صعب ولا يمكن ولا
اياك في لحظة تقولها
اه واهو بكرة ييجي وشايل معاه
فرحة وضحكة ودنيا وحياة
والسكة هنكملها
الايام الي ف حياتنا بنعيشها مره
اوعي تستسلم ف ثانيه للحظه مرة
دا اليوم الحلو الي يبمشي
ف بعاده عشره
الي يحب الدنيا دايما بيشوف جمالها
وبتقدر توصل عيونه للنور ف ليلها
لو في قدامك حواجز
دلوقتي شيلها
خلي احلامك قصادك حاول وجرب
ماتفكرش تسيبها لحظه او منها تهرب
واللي بعيد عنك مسيره
ف يوم يقرب

english.title: Take the control of your dreams
text: All the steps we take, wish for the next one
Every second we approach tomorrow
And the future of our life, we
Make it by ourselves
Every great dream was at first a thought
We forget everything and look for the tomorrow
And there is nothing hard for our power
You know and draw the future of your life
Everyone has a wish, written with his own name
The story and all of its happenings, may make us tired a bit
Take the control of your dream and follow it
The word "hard" or it's not possible is what just you may say in a second
Tomorrow will come and brings with itself
Happiness, laughs, world and life
And the way we always go along to complete it
We just live our days one time
Never sit back even for a second
A nice day that passes
Tomorrow will come
Who loves the world and finds it beautiful
Can see the light with his eyes even at night
If there are obstacles in front of you
Now remove them
Let your dreams be tried and experienced
Never think of quitting or running away from that
And the person who is far from you
One day will approach

arabic.title: إيدى فى إيديك
text: عمرى ما قلت حبيبى لحبيبى معقول
وهقولك من الليلة يا حبيبى على طول
إيدى فى إيديك وعشان خاطر عينيك
هعمل المستحيل اوعدك
هفضل معاك هبقى ضلك حماك
كل همى انى اعيش واسعدك
خليك قدام عينى خلينى وياك
دانا برتاح يا حبيبى وانا عينى شايفاك

english.title: My hand is holding your hands
text: I've never said my love to my love, is that possible!
And from this night, I will call you my love and forever more.
My hand is holding your hands, and for the sake of your eyes,
I will do the impossible, I promise you!
I will stay with you, I will be your shadow and your protection,
My concern is to live and make you happy.
Let me stay in front of your eyes, let me stay with you,
I feel good oh my darling when my eye is seeing you.

arabic.title: ادي الي في بالي
text: ادى اللى فى بالى بالملى
قمر ومن السما نزلى
دى بسم الله مشاء الله
تشوفها تسمى وتصلى
عشان اوصفها ملهاش حل
كلام اغانيه كله اقل
دى خير فى حياتى جانى وهل
ومن حظى انه متشالى
بنسبة 100 فى الـ 100
حاجات اتغيرت فيا
دى حلم بعيد يا ناس
دى اكيد هدية ربنا ليا
فى واحدة لما تقابلها
تسيب الدنيا دى وتجيلها
بغنى سنين لكل الناس
ومن الليلة هغنيلها

english.title: That's what on my mind
text: That's what on my mind,a moon just fell from the sky for me.
you will must saying"masha'Allah" when you are gonna see her.
songs lyrics is not enough for describing her.
she is the gift of my life,was kept for me.
I have been changed 100% .
she is an impossible dream,surely she is my God's gift.
There's one girl when you meet her,you will leaving that world and go back to her.
since along time ago,I was singing for the people,now i am gonna just sing for her.

text: Draw a heart and a smile on the window
The keys to own the world are right before your eyes
Be happy, sing, listen to me
Strenghten your heart
This light was created for your eyes
Draw a heart and a smile on the window

arabic.title: الحكاية حكايتنا
text: الحكاية حكايتنا
والليالي سرقتنا
دنيا مهما خدتنا
وودتنا وجابتنا
لسة ليك جوايا
ألف حاجة معايا
لسه بسمع صوتنا
في ضحكتنا وفرحتنا
لسه كل مكان بروحه
ليك علامة يا حبيبي في روحه
لسه بردو الغالي
وعلى بالي كل يوم عيشناه
مهما عدوا وشوش قصادي
مهما يبعدوا بينا أراضي
القلوب مشتاقة تتلاقى
ده اللي بينا حياة
بصراحة ومن غير حلفان
أحلى زمان
مش بنساه
مهما كنت في لمة
لسه بسرح لما
تيجي سيرتك صدفة
وأشوف صرفة عشان أهدى
ده الحنين وده حكمه
يوجع اللي اتفارقوا
واللي زي ده قدره
يعيش عمره هواه فاكره

english.title: The story is ours
text: the story is ours
and the nights have taken us away
no matter how many times life takes us away from each other
and separate us
there's still in me
for you, a thousand things with me
I still hear our voices
of our laughter and happiness
still, everywhere I go
my love, you've got a mark on my soul
still the precious one
and I remember everyday we've lived together
no matter how many faces I see
no matter how many lands separate us
the hearts are longing to meet
what we share is a life
honestly, and without swearing
the best time
I won't forget it
whenever I'm sitting in a gathering
still my mind goes absent
when you're mentioned suddenly
and try to find a way to calm down
this is longing and this is its reign
hurts the ones who are no longer together
and their fates
to remember their love forever

You long for every beautiful memory I experienced next to you
None of us knows what tomorrow is hiding
But I can tell you everything that happened
The hardest days of my life, ones that I will never be able to describe
And you certainly felt / understood me and experienced similar days
And I am like you and even more
Sometimes I get lost in thought and think about why you and I went away from each other
I didn’t find an answer and came to you
Maybe if I told you would you tell me what we gained
When I was away from you I felt broken down, I missed a lot of things
And I also understand you and know that you’re not well
Because I understand you and know you, I always see you as my darling
You long for every beautiful memory I experienced next to you

english.title: I Am With Her !
text: Since the day her eyes met mine,
And I saw this beautiful laugh,
I've been dreaming of the day she'll be mine, & I hers,
And wake up to find my love beside me..
And now what's been in my imagination is happening in front of me.
My love beside me, in my arms from this night.
Oh God, finally I'm with her !
It called..
Joy brought us together by love, & called us
Me & my love, & our third is happiness
And the dream became true..
Since when have my deepest desire been to reach her ?!
The word "My love" .. say it, my love !
Years of my life will be nothing measured to this word.
Make me happy, say it, please.. for long.

english.title: either you came or not
text: yes Im in love with someone..
she's heavy and hard to reach ,
and she has been torturing alot of people before me
they said she's smart and cant be entrapped
and really confident that it's easy for me to fly (leave)
so I thought about it,if I.. locked her in and cought her..
I will reach to her, then here she either comes or not
I swear by god,there's no other way,
why should I wait all that long?
what am I going to lose ?here she either comes or not
this is underestimation from me,
if I stayed perplexed ..for how many years?
step in and make a decision ,and here she either comes or not
who can fill my eye when I'm an emergency case?
and her eyes have stoled my soul..wish I can live
there are so many eyes,
black,green,blue,
with others it may make a difference,to me its worthless
and here she either comes or not

arabic.title: حاجة مستخبية
text: فى جوه قلبى حاجة مستخبية
كل اما لاجى اقولها فجأه مش بقدر
قدام عينيك بقف وبنسى ايه يتقال
ليه كل مره يجرى فيها كده ليا
وديه هى كلمة واحدة بس مش اكتر
والكلمة ديه عندى فيها راحة البال
حبيتك يوم ما اتلاقينا
لما حكينا اول كلام
حبيتك واحلف على ده

وانت حاجه تانية

انا صعب اعيش حياتى وانت لحظة بعيد

كانت حياتى ناقصة جيت تكملها

english.title: Something Hidden
text: Inside my heart there is something hidden
Everytime I try to say it, I cant
I stand infront of your eyes and I forget everything that should be said
Why does this keep happening to me why
It's only a word not more!
And in it (this word) i'll find contentment
I loved you the day we met
When we spoke the first words
I loved you, I can swear
Wanna hear more? I cant even sleep
People are something and you are something else
You have my feelings, take them and ask
It's difficult for me to live my life while you are far from me even a moment
My feelings for you made me stronger in times of my weakness
My life was incomplete before you
Meeting you is like christmas (come early)

english.title: Something hidden
text: Deep in my heart, I have something hidden.
When I am standing before you, looking into your eyes suddenly I lose words.
I don't know why is it always like that when all I need to say is just one word.
One word, If I say it out loud I will finally have peace of mind.
I loved you when we first met, when we first talked.
I loved you and I swear, do you want me to say more?
I am sleepless ever since.
For me, you are are not like anyone else.
You can easily tell that from the feelings I have for you.
The feeling I have for you, is what gave me strength at the time of weakness.
My life was always missing something and you only came to make it complete.
I loved you when we first met, when we first talked.
I loved you and I swear, do you want me to say more?

arabic.title: خدني إليك
text: خدني إليك
خليني أعيش في هواك
حياتي معاك حياتي ليك
وأحلامي وأمالي وعمري يا عمري كله معاك
بتنده ليك
بصوت الحب واللهفة
ويخطفني حنيني ليك
شعور ما أقدرش على وصفه
وأنا طاير وبستناك
بحبك يا أكسجين الروح
يا أنفاسي عينيك ناسي
يا سكة حلم بمشيها
وأعيش فيها يا روح الروح
وألاقي نفسي من تاني
بحاضرها وماضيها
يا أصدق حب وأجمل حب صعب أنساه
لمسة إيديك
بتحييني بعمر جديد
حبيبي لقاك مطمني
ولو ترضى فداك روحي
وتبقى حبيبي متهني
أنا حبيت
وبقولها لكل الناس
وعايش بيك أنا إحساس
مفرحني مخليني
أروحلك قبل ما تجيني

english.title: Take Me To You
text: Take me to you
Let me live in your love
My life with you, my life for you
My dreams, hopes & my lifetime, my dear, all with you,
Calling for you.
With the voice of love & expectation
And my longing ensnares me to you
A feeling I can't describe
While I'm flying around (wandering), & waiting for you..
I love you, oxygen of my soul
My inhales, your eyes are my home
A dream-way I walk, &
Live in, you soul of my soul
And I find myself again,
With my present & past
You the truest love, & prettiest love, hard to forget
A touch of your hands
Would revive me with a new lifetime
My love, meeting you makes me feel safe
And if you accept, my soul is yours,
To keep you in joy
I fell in love
And I say it out loud, to all.
And I'm living with you a feeling,
That's making me happy & making me,
Go to you before you come to me.

arabic.title: خلص الكلام
text: خلص الكلام كله
قلبى انا ماله
قاسي فى هواه وتعب معاه ولا حس بيا
كان كل شي ليا
وجرح كتير فيا
شوف كام سنه اه من اللى انا شفته بعينيا
مين ده اللى يرضي كده يجرالى كده
بقى ذنبي كده علشان بهواه
اديته قلبى انا وحياتى انا
وتعبت بقى ودى تبقى حياه
زادت جراح قلبى
ولو الغرام ذنبى
توبه خلاص قلبى ياناس هيبيع هوايا
وهيجري ايه يعني
لو كان فى يوم باعنى
لسه السنين جايه كتير مش دي النهايه
مين ده اللى يرضي كده يجرالى كده
بقى ذنبي كده علشان بهواه
اديته قلبى انا وحياتى انا
وتعبت بقى ودى تبقى حياه

text: My heart finished all it's talk and there is nothing left to say
She was cold in her love and tired me but she did not feel my pain
She was everything to me but she constantly hurt me
See how many years of hurt I have seen with my own eyes
men da elly yerda keda yegraly keda

I gave her my heart and my life
And I got worn out, but that's life
zadet gera7 2albi w law el gharam zanbi

And what would happen anyway if she sold me someday
There are still more years to come, this is not the end
men da elly yerda keda yegraly keda

arabic.title: خلينا زي ما احنا
text: خلينا زي ما إحنا
رجوعنا مش في صالحنا
ده بس وجع الفراق
في أوله بيجرحنا
ومع الأيام صدقني
البعد هيريحنا
ده هو وجع الفراق
في أوله بيجرحنا
ما إحنا كنا ويا بعض
تفتكر ريحنا بعض
ده إحنا بعد حلول كتير
مالقيناش غير حل البعد
يبقى نرضى بيه ونسكت
إحنا أصلا مش لبعض
ما تصعبهاش عليا
وحس باللي بيا
ما أنا ما اتمنيتش أعيش
وياك اللحظة ديا
علم قلبك في بعدي
ما يحنش تاني ليا
وانساني عشان تعيش
وماتفكرش فيا

english.title: Let us be like what we are
text: Let us be like what we are,
Coming back to each other is not advisable,
That's just the pain of breaking up which bother us in the initial days of it,
And believe me with the passage of time,
The distance from each other will be easier to us,
That's just the pain of breaking up which bother us in the initial days of it,
Whenever we were together,
Were thinking of how to get the rid of the other!
Anf after many solutions,
Did not find a solution better than breaking up, will be satisfied and silent with it,
We were not for each other at all,
Don't make it hard for me,
And feel my internal intentions,
I dont want to live
Even a second more with you,
Teach your heart that in my absence
Not to be kind with me again,
And forget me in order to live,
And don't think about me.

english.title: Let Us Live
text: I miss your love
When I'm with you
I wish to live my entire life inside your heart
To melt in love
to sweet talk to..
each other about our love that we are melting in
Let us live, you and I, for each other my love, just for a bit
Why should we think about the nights that have passed when there are more days ahead of us
It's enough for me to be beside you
And to have you beside me
Let us live, you and I, for each other my love, just for a bit
I called out with my heart and your heart came
Sweetheart don't you dare go out of my sight even for one night
My heart worries about you
Come to me, I am for you
I dream of you ever second, dream of you being close next to me
Let us live, you and I, for each other my love, just for a bit
Why should we think about the nights that have passed when there are more days ahead of us

english.title: That is for you
text: what?
What is that is my heart is feel?
tell me what you are you doing in me?
Is that is the love which they are telling about it?
Oh, my God
For that is a smile in your eyes oh
for that is the longing was take me with it
That is too much than what I hope,
That is because of you my love.
Because my heart is with he or she
Maybe I am alive
Why?
With out asking why my love?
that my way i will walking with you
we are feeling happiness
That is like a fate
How and when find a love

arabic.title: ذكرياتك ميح
text: لما تقوم الصبح وذكرياتك ميح
مانتاش عارف نايم جارح ولا جريح
حب وذكرى امبارح بكرة كل ده صفر
هتلاقي نفسك تايه زي القشة في ريح
ولا داريانين مين صاحب مين
وفلان بوش ولا بوشين
لو بالنسيان احنا عيانين
أكيد احسن لنا
العمر سكينته مش ناعمة
والكل شايف لكن أعمى
دول قالوا على النسيان نعمة
من مليون سنة
لما تقوم الصبح وعارف مين حواليك
وحبة أيام فاضلة ناوية تقضي عليك
واللي اديته جنيته قسية يا قلوب تلج
كده فاكر ولا ناسي أنهي الأريح ليك

english.title: You have no memories
text: When you wake up in the morning and you have no memories
You don't know before you sleep you hurt someone or you was hurt
Love and memory of yesterday and tomorrow is zero
You will find your self lost as straw in the wind
You don't know who is friend to who
and that person(anyone) has one face or two(fake)
if forgetting makes us considered sick
sure it's better for us
Life is not soft(easy)
everybody sees but they are blind(they don't see the real meaning of things)
It is said forgetting is a bless a million years ago
When you wake up in the morning and you know people around you
and some remaining days (in your life) will kill you
and what you were tire of they eat it like snow (you got tired and they just take what you spent your life in)
In this case what is more comfortable to you to remember or to forget?
You don't know who is friend to who
and that person(anyone) has one face or two(fake)
if forgetting makes us considered sick
sure it's better for us
Life is not soft(easy)
everybody sees but they are blind(they don't see the real meaning of things)
It is said forgetting is a bless a million years ago

arabic.title: راسمك في خيالي
text: ياما حكيت عليك للناس وللأيام
قالوا لي خيال وقولت حقيقة مش أوهام
قالوا ملاك بتحلم بيه ومش إنسان
راهنت عليك وأديني بقيت أنا الكسبان
ياما حكيت عليك للناس وللأيام
قالوا لي خيال وقولت حقيقة مش أوهام

من قبل ما أكون وياك
وسنين وأنا بأستناك
عايش على نار الشوق

عايش في أمل كداب
مسكين ماشي ورا سراب
ومسيره في يوم هيفوق

ومش فاهمين وسألوني عرفت منين
إن في يوم هأقابلك بين بقية الناس
وأنا رديت بإني مشيت ورا الإحساس

english.title: I've drawn you in my imagination
text: How often have I told stories about you to people, and to the days,
They told me it's but imagination, and I said it's a reality, not an illusion.
They told me you're dreaming of an angel, not a human,
I bet on you, and here at the end I am the winner.
How often have I told storied about you to people, and to the days,
They told me it's but imagination, and I said it's a reality, not an illusion.
They told me you're dreaming of an angel, not a human,
I bet on you, and here at the end I am the winner.
I've drawn you in my imagination,
from before I became with you.
And for years I was waiting for you,
living on the fire of longing.
They said about me, many a night,
"he is living on a false hope,
poor thing, following nothing but a mirage
but no doubt one day he'll wake up"
And now the poor thing has those envious of him,
and they're perplexed, and they ask me how did you know,
that one day I would meet you from amongst the rest of the people?
I responded that I followed my feelings.
And now the poor thing has those envious of him,
and they're perplexed, and they ask me how did you know,
that one day I would meet you from the rest of the people?
I responded that I followed my feelings.
I've drawn you in my imagination,
from before I became with you.
And for years and I was waiting for you,
living on the fire of longing.
They said about me, many a night,
"he is living on a false hope,
poor thing, following nothing but a mirage
but no doubt one day he'll wake up"

text: مش حتنساني
بكرة حتجيني
يوم ما تبكي ويخنقك غرورك
هتقولي نجيني
ايوة لسه لك مكان في قلبي
بس مش واقفة عليك سنيني
مش حموت علشان منتاش جمبي

مش حتقتلني
مش حتمحيني

او كاسر عيني

english.title: A Message
text: you won't forget me, you'll come to me
when you cry and your pride suphocates you
you'll tell me "Save me" (you'll call for y help)
yes you still have a place in my heart
but but my life is not about you
I won't die just because you're not next to me
simply because you're not what make me survive
you won't kill me, you won't erase me
no one has ever humiliated me or made me low

text: رمضان ليه روح

أهل و أحباب
مع لمة أصحاب
ريحة أيام خير و محبة .. و فرحة فى كل مكان
رمضان رمضان .. رمضان نوّر

أصل ده شهر بداية الفرحة .. و أخره ليلة العيد

english.title: Ramadan Lightened
text: Ramadan has a special soul (air)
A door for the neighbor open wide
And children with lanterns going & coming.. singing to Ramadan.
Family & loved ones
And a gathering of friends
The smell of days of generosity & love .. & joy everywhere.
Ramadan Ramadan.. Ramadan lightened (illuminated) everywhere
And generosity overflows & ever increases more
And we feel each others' troubles more & more     x2
ـــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــ
It has a different taste
And when the sun goes down,
The whole family gather & come together .. the near & the far.
Ramadan is a feeling
Not just days
As it is a month of joy beginning .. & at its end the night of Eid.
Ramadan Ramadan.. Ramadan lightened (illuminated) everywhere
And generosity overflows & ever increases more
And we feel each others' troubles more & more     x2

الله يخلى عيون ملقتشى اوصفها
الرمش ولا العين ولا سوا الاتنين
عمرى فى هواكى ماتوب

english.title: sultan gamalik
text: ya lil ya lili//(can be translated like aman in turkish and "lil" means night)
originally it's the one like the moon(as beautiful as the moon) that the heart should love
i'll never forsake (like "tovbe" in turkish)in your love that's destiny and i'll follow it
have to melt and melt and never escape the fate
originally it's the one like the moon(as beautiful as the moon) that the heart should love
and the passion made me swear not to forsake
i'll never forsake (like "tovbe" in turkish)in your love that's destiny and i'll follow it

english.title: Soultan gmalak
text: the sultan(like in turkish :king) of your beauty ordered my heart and my heart said "allah" (amaizment)
i have to melt and melt and never escape the fate
may god keep those eyes that i couldn't describe
for their sake my life is easy to give up ,they charm me when i see them
the eyelash or the eye or may be the two of them
i'll never forsake in your love
that's fate and i'll follow it
the sultan(like in turkish :king) of your beauty ordered my heart and my heart said "allah" (amaizment)
my heart is melting melting
and i came back again
i have to melt and melt and never escape the fate

arabic.title: صابر على حالي
text: كان الحب فينا
كانوا فى ليالينا
كان شوقنا فى قلوبنا
لو تعبنا يقوينا
صابر على حالى
شايل انا وقلبي
مليون سؤال
صابر على حالى
عايش على رجوعك
ولو احتمال
تانى ياقلبي تانى
هبقى لوحدى تانى
حاجه مخوفانى
يكون فعلاً بينسانى

english.title: Patient About What I Have
text: Love was in us
They were in our nights
Our longing was in our hearts,
If we felt tired, it would make us stronger
Patient about what I have   x2
Carrying, I & my heart
A million questions
Patient about what I have   x2
Living in expectation of your return
Even if only a (slight) probability
Again, my heart, again
I will be alone again!
Something is scaring me,
That she would be really forgetting about me

arabic.title: صور
text: حبة صور ساكتين متعلقين حوالينا
صور لاحلي سنين مع ناس غاليين علينا
فيهم اللي سابنا ومبقاش معانا
وفيهم شبابنا وايام صبانا
وراهم كتبنا تاريخ يوم لقانا
صور سايبه فينا حاجه معيشانا
صور لسفر لفرح لسهر
لحبيب في حياتي في فتره ظهر
ولأحلي أيام
الله يا سلام
اللحظه دي لو ترجع بينا
معظم صورنا زمان
افراح ولمة وزينة
ولا حد فيها زعلان
ولا تلقي صوره حزينة
صور في الاجازة
علي البحر في تمانية
ياريت كنا خدنا
صوره لكل ثانية
صور عيد ميلادنا
ولمة صحابنا
وناس مش بايدنا
بقوا في حتة تانية

english.title: Photos
text: A few silent photos hanging around us
photos of the best years with people dear to us
some of them left and are no longer with us
and our youth and childhood
behind them, we've written the date of our meeting
photos keeping something within us that's keeping us alive
photos of travels, of happiness, of sleepless nights
of a lover who'd appeared in my life for a while
and of the best days
oh, how wonderful
if that moment were to come back
most of our old photos
happiness, togetherness and decorations
and no one looks sad in them
and you can't find a sad photo
photos of a vacation
on the beach at 8
I wish if we took
a photo of every second
photos of our birthdays
and gatherings with our friends
and people that we couldn't keep 1
they're in another place

arabic.title: عمره ما يغيب
text: من يومين تلاته اتسألت عليك
ربي وحده عالم اللي قولته عليك
حبيبي لما تيجي سيرته
انا بقول يا ناس خسرته
حبيبي نفسي يوم اقابله بس فين الاقيه
حبيبي عمره ما يغيب
حبيبي وعده ليا اللي عايش بيه
امانه نفسي لتسلمولي عليه
جوه قلبي والله لو بعيد عالعين
دوبت الف مره بعده شوق وحنين
حياتي مش ناقصها غيره
ولا هكون في يوم لغيره
وادي حالي بعد منه غير ما كنت عليه
حبيبي عمره ما يغيب
حبيبي وعده ليا اللي عايش بيه
امانه نفسي لتسلمولي عليه
انا هموت عليه ايوة ليا زمان
هقابله يوم ايوة في الإمكان
حبيبي واعمل ايه عمري واتعلقت بيه
والحكايه في كلمتين خلاص هموت عليه
حبيبي عمره ما يغيب
حبيبي وعده ليا اللي عايش بيه
امانه نفسي لتسلمولي عليه

english.title: She's Never Away
text: Two or three days ago I was asked about you
My God only knows what I said about you1
When my love is talked about,
I tell the people I lost her2
I wish to meet my love one day, but where can I find her?
My love would never stay away
I am living on my lover's promise
I beseech you to send her my greetings
[She's] inside my heart, by God, even if far from my eyes
I melted a thousand times in longing and yearning after her [being gone]
My life is only missing her
And I will never belong to anyone but her
And here is my state after her [being gone], much different from how I was [with her]
My love would never stay away
I am living on my lover's promise
I beseech you to send her my greetings
I have been dying for her,yes I have, since ages
I will meet her some day, yes I will, possibly
She's my lover, what can I do? She's my life and I have been captivated by her
And the story in two words really: I'm dying for her 3
My love would never stay away
I am living on my lover's promise
I beseech you to send her my greetings

english.title: my love  never disappears
text: they asked me about her ..two or three days ago
God knows .. How sweet words I said about her
whenever  they mention  her name
I say I regret  losing  her
I wish I can meet her again  but  where
my love .. Never disappears
my love .. I am living with her promises
I beg you all to  send her  my salute
deep inside my heart  even if she is far far away
I suffered  thousand time from longing
only her ..the missing thing in my life
I will never be to another
it has been  vastly changed .. My life after her
my love .. Never disappears
my love .. I am living with her promises
I beg you all to  send her  my salute
I die   from my need to her
I ll meet her if possible
my love  .. My life is not independent of her
the story  in two words  .. I die  for her
my love .. Never disappears
my love .. I am living with her promises
I beg you all to  send her  my salute

arabic.title: عيوني سهرانة
text: انت اللي طول حياتي عشت أنا أدور عليه
انت اللي بين إيديه
نستني الدنيا دي
خليتني أحب عمري وأنسى قبلك عشت ليه
انت اللي روحي فيه
انت اللي روحي فيه
ده عيوني سهرانة ليك طول الليالي
آه من كلامك والسحر اللي في عينيك
نسيتني روحي معرفش إيه جرالي
حبيت يا قلبي وما اتسماش عليك
الرقة والبراءة اللي في عيونك والحنان
وكلامك من زمان
أنا ياما حلمت بيه
ببقى في أحسن حالاتي وانت قدامي عشان
انت أجمل مكان
ارتاح القلب فيه

english.title: My Eyes Staying Up
text: You whom I've lived my entire life looking for
You who between whose hands,
I forgot all this world.
You made me love my life & forget before you, why I lived !
You, in whom my soul is
You, in whom my soul is
My eyes are staying up for you all the nights
Oh, your speaking & the charm in your eyes
You made me forget myself, not knowing what took me
You fell in love, O my poor heart, & with out mercy !
Gentleness & innocence in your eyes & your kindness
And your speaking, from so long,
I've been dreaming of
I become at my best state while you're in front of me, because..
You are the nicest place that
My heart found comfort at.

arabic.title: في حضن عنيك
text: في حضن عنيك لقيت نفسىي
وهفضل ليك
ده انا طول عمري مستنيك
حياتى بحالها ملك ايديك
سنين بتفوت
سنين تجري
حبيبي هعيش معاك عمري
متبعدنيش
عشان خاطري
ماليش بعديك
وانا وياك
وصلت لآخر الاحلام
خلاص مبقتش اخاف
م الدنيا والايام
حبيبي انت اللي نسيتني
ليالي زمان
يا واخد قلبي وعنيا
وروحي كمان

english.title: In the Embrace of Your Eyes
text: I found myself in the embrace of your eyes
And I will remain yours
I've been waiting for you my whole life
My entire life is all yours
Years go
Years pass by
My darling, I will live my life with you
Don't push me away
for my sake, please.
I have no one but you
Being with you
I have reached the last of my dreams
I finally don't fear
the world and the days
Darling, you are the one who made me forget
the nights in the past
Oh you've taken away my heart, my eyes
And my soul too

arabic.title: قالو فيكي
text: قالوا فيكى حنان زيادة
ربنا ضايفـُه
لأ وفيكى جمال ف روحك
لوحدى انا شايفـُه
حاجتين نفسى اقول حاجتين
كنت قبلك فين والنهاردة انا فين
بعدين انا اعيش معاكى سنين
او اعيش يادوب ساعتين
كدا ضعت فى الحالتين
ياااااااه احكى ليه ف حكايات
دول تلات كلمات
كان ناقصنى حاجات
ياااااه والنهاردة لاقيت
اكتر ما انا اتمنيت
وعوضت اللى فات

english.title: they said about you
text: they said that you have excess of affection only god can see
aloof fiki hanan ziyada rabna dhay'oo
and you there is beauty in your soul that i can only see
la we fiki gamal fi roohek li wahdi ana shayfoo
there are two things to say ,two things
hagteen nefsi a'ool hagteen
where was i before you and where am i today?
konti ablak fin wennaharda ana fin?
also i live for years with you
ba3deen ana a3ish ma3aki snin
aw a3ish ya doob sa3teen
or i live barely two hours
i'm lost either way
keda dhe3t fi el halteen
ah why do i say?there are stories that have only three words,i was missing things
yah ahki lih fe hkayat dol thalat kelmat kan na'esni hagat
and today i found more than what i wished for and compensate what was missed

arabic.title: قالوا عنك
text: قالوا عنك الجمال في عنيكي بات
قالوا إنك أحلي من كل البنات
قالوا عنك الجمال في عنيكي بات
قالوا إنك أحلي من كل البنات
وإن حبك سكة شايكة
قالوا فيكي من الملايكة
روحت أشوفك وبصراحة
فوقتي كل التوقعات
قالوا عن عينيكي عنوان الجمال
كل حاجة فيكي أحلى من الخيال
قالوا عن عينيكي عنوان الجمال
كل حاجة فيكي أحلى من الخيال
بس فيه سور بيداريكي
صعب يوصل حد ليكي
قلت أروح وانشالله أحبك
هو مين مالحب مات
وأما شوفتك قلبي ليكي اتشد شد
ياللي حبك اتفرض على قلبي فرض
وأما شوفتك قلبي ليكي اتشد شد
ياللي حبك اتفرض على قلبي
لو هقول بدر في تمامه
هظلمك وأرفع مقامه
من ثواني عملتي فيا
اللي عمر ما عمله حد

english.title: They Said About You
text: They said about you that beauty in your eyes dwelt
They said that you are prettier than all the girls
They said about you that beauty in your eyes dwelt
They said that you are prettier than all the girls
And that your love is a rough path
They said you've something from angels
I went to see you, & honestly,
You exceeded all expectations !
They said your eyes to be the ultimate model of beauty
Everything about you is prettier than imagination
They said your eyes to be the ultimate model of beauty
Everything about you is prettier than imagination
But there is a wall hiding you
Difficult for any one to reach you
I said I'd go, what harm if I fell for you
As who has ever died of love !
And when I saw you, my heart got attracted hard to you
You, whose love was imposed tightly upon my heart
And when I saw you, my heart got attracted hard to you
You, whose love was imposed tightly upon my heart
If I'm to say, you a full moon at its grandeur,
I would be describing you less than you deserve & it more than it is (the moon)
In a matter of seconds you did to me
What no human ever done to me

arabic.title: قدام الناس
text: أنت اللي بين إيديك بدأت أعيش
حبيت سنيني بيك عشان بحبك
خليت حياتي جنة من مفيش
خليتني أنام وأقوم أقول بأحبك
قدام الناس أنا وأنت بقينا لبعض الليلة خلاص
أصل أنت يا قلبي في قلبي غير الناس
ويا واخد روحي و عيني الليلة أنا جيت
وبأقول حبيت
قدام الناس
أنا وأنت بقينا لبعض الليلة خلاص
أصل أنت يا قلبي
في قلبي غير الناس
ويا واخد روحي و عيني
الليلة أنا جيت
وبقول حبيت
وياك نسيت حبيبي عمري كام
ونسيت حاجات كتير عشان بأحبك
بقى شيء طبيعي بينّا في الكلام
بين كل كلمتين بقول بحبك

english.title: In Front of Everyone
text: You are the one who made me feel alive
I now love my life because I love you
You transformed my life from nothing to a paradise
You made me say I love you in every second
In front of everyone, we are ours tonight finally
My darling, you have a special spot in my heart
My soul and eyes are yours, I've come tonight
And I'm telling you: I'm in love
When I'm with you, I forget how old I am
And I forgot so many things because I love you
It became such a normal thing for us when we talk
that between every two words we say "I love you" to each other

arabic.title: قول واتكلم
text: حبيبي وانا وياك شايف قصادي ملاك
عايش في جنة معاك
وازاي عملت دا كله ف قلبي
ليالى وانا بناديك عايزك وبحلم بيك
وبقول يارب الاقيك
و ف يوم وليلة لقيتك جنبي
قول واتكلم
قول كل اللي نفسك فيه
دا اليوم اللي مستنيه
قول يا حبيبي
دا اول ما شوفت عنيك
وانا عارف هكون يوم ليك
حبيبي لمسة ايد منك خدتني بعيد
وادتني عمر جديد
مش عايز ابعد عنك ثانية
ياريت عمري يطول
وافضل معاك على طول
نحلم سوا ونقول
هنعيش لبعض وننسى الدنيا
قول واتكلم
قول كل اللي نفسك فيه
دا اليوم اللي مستنيه
قول يا حبيبي
دا اول ما شوفت عنيك
وانا عارف هكون يوم ليك

english.title: say and talk
text: baby when I'm with you I'm seeing an angel in front of me
I'm living in heaven with you,
and how come you did all this to my heart!
for nights I have been calling for you,
I need you and I'm deaming about you
and I was saying ''I pray god to find you''
and in a day and night I found you by my side
say and talk
say all that you wish to say,
this is the day I was waiting for
speak my love
when I first saw your eyes..
I knew I will be yours one day!
baby a hand touch from you..took me far away
and gave me a whole new life..
I don't want to be far from you,even for one second
wish my life go longer..and stay with you forever
to dream together and say..
we will live for each others and forget about the world
say and talk
say all that you wish to say,
this is the day I was waiting for
speak my love
when I first saw your eyes..
I knew I will be yours one day!

arabic.title: كان مالي
text: كان مالى باللي جرالي انا كان مالي
لا كنت كده ولا كان ده حالي
بسأل سؤالى يا ليالى جاوبيني
ليه زادوا اشواقي واحترت فى بعاده
نسيني طب ايه استفاده
انا لو قصاده هعتب عليه
وحشني ونفسي لو اقابله
وافكره باللى فات كله
قريب لازم اوصله ومهما الامر كلفنى
بتيجي ناس وناس تمشي
بيخلص يومي ما بنامشي
ولما بنام مبحلمش بغيره وهو عارف ليه
ايه تانى مخبي ايه يا زماني تاني
بعد حبيبى ما ساب مكاني
بتفوت ثواني الفرقه سنين
كل مدى بحنله بتعب زياده
بيدارى صوت قلبى اللى نادى
ويدارى جوايا الحنين
وحشني ونفسي لو اقابله
وافكره باللى فات كله
قريب لازم اوصله ومهما الامر كلفنى
بتيجي ناس وناس تمشي
بيخلص يومي ما بنامشي
ولما بنام مبحلمش بغيره وهو عارف ليه

english.title: What was happening to me
text: What was happening to me with the one who injured me, what was happening to me?
I was not like this, and I was not in this mood
My nights, I ask a question please answer me
Why does my eagerness increase? Why I am restless in her absence?
She forgot me, what's the benefit of that?
If I was in front  of her, I would  accuse her
I missed her and want to see her
And make her remember all the things passed
As soon as possible it's necessary for me to reach her and no matter how hard it will be
People come and go
A day ends and I don't sleep
And when I sleep I dream of her and she knows why
Oh time! What are you hiding from me again?
After my dear left my house
Every second passes as a year
All the time my plent attention to her made me tired a lot
She knew the sound of my heart calling her
And knows kindness filled me

arabic.title: كان وكان
text: وده كان وكان وكان
كان فتره حلوة واحلى احساس بالامان
كان حب اراهن حس بيه في يوم انسان
كان اللي مهما اتعبله راضي ومش تعبان
توأم ايه كان حبيبي
وانا اللي حلمت وفاجأني فى نص الحلم
نهايه غريبه ومتنفعش حتى لفيلم
ده مفيش حدوتة حب تعيش بطلها طلع جبان
وده كان وكان وكان
آه من تعب الفراق
ده اللي اتحكاله عن مراره غير اللي داق
وخصوصا اما بيبقى من غير اتفاق
مش سحر حد ينام بجرح ويصحى فاق
وانا مش بنسى وده عيبي
وانا اللي حلمت وفاجأني فى نص الحلم
نهايه غريبه ومتنفعش حتى لفيلم
ده مفيش حدوتة حب تعيش بطلها طلع جبان
وده كان وكان وكان

english.title: Once upon a Time and a Time
text: Once Upon a Time and a Time
Once upon a time and a time and a time
There was a great period and the sweetest feeling of safety
There was a love I bet no human ever felt before
No matter how much effort I put in for her1 I was content and not tired
What twin? She was my lover.
And it was I who dreamt and she surprised me in the middle of the dream
A weird ending that is not even fitting for a film
There is no love story that lives when the hero turns out to be a coward
Once upon a time and a time and a time
Oh, such pain is the separation
What I was told about its bitterness is nothing like what I taste
And especially when it is without consent
There's no magic; The wounded do not go to sleep then wake up alright
And I do not forget and this is my flaw
And it was I who dreamt and she surprised me in the middle of the dream
A weird ending that is not even fitting for a film
There is no love story that lives when the hero turns out to be a coward
Once upon a time and a time and a time

english.title: It Was
text: it was... it was... it was
Was a lovely period and the best feeling of peace and security
Was a love I bet that nobody felt before
Was who I struggle heavily for her and I'm satisfied and don't feel tired
Me and her were twins. No, she was my love
And I who dreamed and she sudden me in the middle of the dream
Such a strange end that won't fit even a film
there is no love story lives which hero was coward
it was.. it was.. it was
Oh what a cumbersome parting
who has been told about its pain is not like who felt
and especially when that occur without agreement
its not a charm to let somebody sleeps with wound and then he wakes up without
and I'm not forgetting and this is my fault
And I who dreamed and she sudden me in the middle of the dream
Such a strange end that won't fit even a film
there is no love story lives which hero was coward
it was.. it was.. it was

arabic.title: كانت هناك
text: كانت هناك واقفه بتتكلم مع واحد معاها
وفضلت انا واقف مكاني بس قلبي راح وراها
كان المكان فيه ناس كتير مش بس هيا
مبقتش شايف يومها انا غيرها بعينيا
اعرف منين ان اللي واقفه معاه يا قلبي مش حبيبها
خايف اروح تحصل معايا اي حاجه مش حاببها
لو كان يا قلبي قلبها من الحب فاضي
ممكن قصاد الناس آخدها في حضني عادي
وابتديت اسمع جوايا حاجه
حاجه ياما حلمت اسمعها من سنين
والليالي الحلوه اللي في خيالي
الليلادي انا بيني وبينها خطوتين
بالصدفه كان في حد صاحبي عارفها عرفني عليها
وقف الزمان بيا وبيها لما جت عيني في عينيها
مدت ايديها وسلمت قلبي وجعني
بالسرعه دي معقول اكون حبيتها يعني
كان الكلام فى عيونها بيقول اللي تاه فوق الشفايف
كده خلاص مبقاش في عندي اي حجه اني ابقي خايف
قولتلها انتي اللي منايا ابقى ليها
ضحكت عيونها ضحكه لسه مش ناسيها
وابتديت اسمع جوايا حاجه
حاجه ياما حلمت اسمعها من سنين
والليالي الحلوه اللي في خيالي
الليلادي انا بيني وبينها خطوتين

english.title: Kanet Henak
text: He was there, he was talking to someone next to him
I was still in my place, but my heart went after him
There were so many people, it was not just that
I did not see anyone else that day
How am I supposed to know that your man is not his lover, my dear?
I was afraid to go to it, I was afraid of something I did not want
If my heart is not full of love my heart
I can get her lap normal in front of people
I started to hear something in me
Something I've hoped to hear for years
And the beautiful nights of my dream
There are only two steps between me tonight
Randomly a friend knew him and introduced me to him
When I looked at the eye, it was time and time
My heart ached when I extended my hand and saluted
Is it possible that I can not love her so quickly?
The words in his eyes say the words that disappear on the dips
Now there is no excuse for me to be scared!
"I'm hoping you'll have me" I told him
I still can not forget my smile
I started to hear something in me
Something I've hoped to hear for years
And the beautiful nights of my dream
There are only two steps between me tonight

arabic.title: كفاية حلول وسط
text: مالوش لازمة العتاب مين فينا حبه أقل
واللي إحنا وصلنا ليه صدقني وضع ممل
كفاية حلول وسط لازم نشوفلنا حل
يا تروح يا أنا أروح
مالناش قسمة ولا لينا نصيب
وبنكدب على بعض واسمك قال ليا حبيب
دلوقتي بقيت ولا توحشني لو عني تغيب
كإني عيشت عمري كل ده ماليش حبيب
م اللي حصلنا باين كده مافيش نصيب
و يا قلبي ياللي ظالمك تملي
دايماً وباجي عليك
آه
لو فاكره لسه
يا قلبي انسى
وأنا اللي يوم هداويك

english.title: The current solutions are eanough!
text: There's no need to blame the one who loved less,
And believe me we reached a unpleasant situation,
The solutions which are between us are enough(useless) it's necessary to find another,
You Go or I will leave,
There was no destiny for us,
We tell lie  and call each other dear!
Now you will not miss me if you go,
As if l lived my whole life without a person to like,
That's clear nothing was gained,
Oh my heart I always was cruel to you,
And made you sigh,
If you just think about her,
My heart forget,
And I am the person who will cure you one day.

arabic.title: كل يوم من ده
text: هأحتاج لعيني ليه وعينيكي معجزة وآية
هأحتاج لصوتي ليه خلاص قولت اللي جوايا
بالعقل أنا محتاج لإيه
هأحتاج مرايا ليه وقدامي انتي ومعايا
هأحتاج لناس ولدنيا ليه طب ما انت أهو كفاية
بالعقل أنا محتاج لإيه
آه لو كل يوم من ده
كل يوم من ده
إيه الكلام دا
كان فين دا
أنا عشت مستنيكي عمري وكنتي وحشاني
دلوقتي مش لاقي في حياتي حاجة ناقصاني
بالعكس أنا أحسن كتير
أنا مش هأسيبك لحظة واحدة ملكتي تفكيري
مش هتلاقيلك بكرة ذكرى حلوة من غيري
قصر الكلام
أنا وأنتي غير

english.title: Everyday Like That
text: Why would I need my eyes, while yours are a miracle & a marvel
Why would I need my voice, I said all I had inside me
By reason, what I'm ever going to need?!
Why would I need a mirror, while you're in front of me & with me
Why would I need people & world, as you're enough for me
By reason, what I'm ever going to need?!
Oh, if everyday was like that
Everyday like that
What's all that !
Where was that !
I lived waiting for you all my lifetime, missing you
Now, I can't find a tiny thing missing in my life
Actually, I'm much better
I won't leave you for a moment, you owned my mind
Starting tomorrow, you won't find a single happy memory without me in it
In short,
You & I are different (peerless).

arabic.title: كلمة
text: و بشهدلك قصاد الناس
قومي يلا تعالي
قومي سمعيها لي
دي كلمة بالنسبة لي
أغلى عندي من الحياة دي بكتير
كلمة منك ليا
تيجي و تقوليها لي
و لما هتقوليها لي
مش هفوت الليلة دي على خير
و خلاص
ما خلاص أنا هديت ولقيت إحساس
توهت فيه
وبشهدلك قصاد الناس
و خلاص
ما خلاص أنا هديت ولقيت إحساس
توهت فيه
وبشهدلك قصاد الناس
وبشهدلك قصاد الناس
فيه أمور متسابة
وأنا في عرض إجابة
بتفكري؟ كدابة
لأ دلع وانتِ واصلة لقرار
كلمة منك ليا
مش كتير عليا
ماتسهليها شوية
داخل أنا دنيا مش داخل نار
و خلاص
ما خلاص أنا هديت ولقيت إحساس
توهت فيه
وبشهدلك قصاد الناس
و خلاص
ما خلاص أنا هديت ولقيت إحساس
توهت فيه
وبشهدلك قصاد الناس
وبشهدلك قصاد الناس

english.title: Word
text: And I promise in front of people
Stand up and come, hurry  up!
Stand up and make me hear (tell me my love)
This word for me
Is much more precious than my life
A word from you to me
Come and say it to me
And when you say it to me
This night will go all good.
That's done!
I was guided and finally I saw (experienced) that feeling
I was shocked
And I will promise to you in front of people
There are some unfinished things
And I am ready to do them
Do you think? Liar!
Don't caress when you are taking a decision
A word from you to me
That's not hard for me
To make it easier for you
I'm in the fire, the world is not in it.

arabic.title: لا عتاب ولا حيرة
text: لا عتاب ولا حيرة ولا لوم ولا غيرة ولا أي خصام ولا خوف
ولا شوق يرمينا ولا نار تكوينا ولا قلبي يبات ملهوف
طول ما انت معايا يا أغلى حبايبي
قلبي ملك إيديك
ولا يوم ولا ليلة
رح نبعد ليلة
دي الدنيا جميلة
وحنبعد ليه
قربلي تعالى
يا شاغلني تعالى
البعد أنا لا لا
مقدرش عليه
أيام وليالي ديماً في خيالي وفي قلبي مابتسبنيش
انت اللي نادوني عليك وخدوني
وانت اللي في حضنه بعيش
لو جابو لقلبي الدنيا بحالها
غيرك انت ماليش

english.title: No Blame Nor Confusion
text: No blame, nor confusion, nor reproach, nor jealousy, not any dispute, nor fear
Not a longing to throw us, or fire burning us, or my heart to spend the night in desperation
As long as you're with me my dearest beloved,
And my heart is a property of your hands
Not a day nor a night
Are we going to be far
Life is pretty
So why we would be apart
Come close, come
You preoccupying me, come
Remoteness, I, no no,
Won't tolerate it
Days & nights, always in my imagination & in my heart not leaving me
You whose eyes called me to you & took me
And you who in her embrace I live
If they brought my heart the whole world
No one else I would have

arabic.title: لسه بتخاف
text: لسه بتخاف م الفراق
لو تيجي سيرتي
لو شوفت عيني
بتبكي هدمع عنيك

You said : try
I said : okay

If you will go, go now
If you will stay, don't go away

For nights, I have been building  an illusion and a dream and in just a second every thing was gone

Sometimes when the wound comes fast, it will be much easier
From the start I told you

Today, I ask you

It's hard for me to forgive you after your wound

By the way, I will miss you
Even if I don't forgive you

She came close,

made me collect and memorize some information.
She is a beauty that made me crazy about her.

She is the one for whom I would turn nuts to be with.
She is the one for whom I agree to even die just to be with.
I would give her my whole life just in case.

I loved her of course; there's no question about it.
To leave her is not a possibility.
She is the one I wanted to be with from long ago.
She is the one for whom I would turn nuts to be with.
She is the one for whom I agree to even die just to be with.
She is the one I wanted to be with from long ago.

english.title: And What Should I Do
text: Why are they blaming me, why
Only if they would come to see her
The color of the sky is in her eyes
And the moon is her sister
She's an angel that wasn't among us
And only chance brought her down here
And what should I do, huh, what should I do?
I describe only her eyes in two days
So all the rest would probably take not less than years
I describe only her eyes in two days
So all the rest would probably take not less than years
So, is she one of the miracles then?!
Or just beyond imagination
Who ever like her went through
Beauty contests

Really he was honest who said that!
And what should I do, huh, what should I do?
One word from her, & I forget the whole world,
And for her eyes I'm ready to bring it down (world)
First when I saw her & she smiled, my heart was finished-with!
Her eyes really enchant, & worlds to be traveled for them
I searched, but never found a match of her beauty, can you believe it!
Ok, get an exemplar from the beauties & let's try match
This is not a compliment, not just fancy words
If she passed near roses, I challenge you to tell them apart!

english.title: And I Remembered
text: My life, while she is not in, is YEARS that passed by & I adapted to that (satisified myself with it).
With me was thinking if I encountered her eyes, I would normally let that pass
And now-here, you whom I thought I'd forgotten, I met tonight & got staggered/shaked/wavered.
How come that there are things that die, then comes a (mere) coincidence revives them!
And I remembered, when my eye met her eye, my YEARS with her.
And I remembered a promise that was between her & me, long ago we made.
And I remembered her clutch/grasp to my hand, with my hand at-the-end letting her go. (while my hand was already..) (x2)
In front of me, her eyes confused/puzzled, come close or hide away?!
Now it has come, the day that I see her on & we wouldn't talk!!! What a loss!!    :'(
That's hard for me, & what should I do, I have nothing else on my hand (to do).
Well, at least I saw her eyes, because I really missed them.
And I remembered, when my eye met her eye, my YEARS with her.
......long ago we made.
....... her clutch to my hand, with my hand at-the-end letting her go.
And I remembered, when my eye met her eye, my YEARS with her.
And I remembered a promise that was between her & me, long ago we made.
And I remembered her clutch to my hand, with my hand at-the-end letting her go.

قلبي عاشق على بابك غنى
وبيحلم يرجع للجنه
وحياه الحب اللي ما بيننا توبه من دي النوبه
سامحنى يا اللى قلبي وعيوني
مبطلوش عليك يسألوني
بلاش تسيبني وحياة هوانا سماح
يا حب عمري خليك معايا
بلاش تروح وتعند كفايه
تعالى شوف ايه بعدك حصلي
ياللي ياللي ياللي
ياللي زعلان مني ومخاصمني
ومش عايز تاني تكلمني
واخد على خاطرك اوي مني يا حبيبي انا آسف
ده انت عمري وعمري مفيش بعده
ومسهر عيني كده في بعده
ومطول ليلي وانا مواعده وعامل مش عارف

arabic.title: ياللي غايب
text: ياللي غايب عن عينيا وسايبني وانا قلبي معاك
إرجع تاني حتى ثانية وارحم قلبي اللي بيهواك
لو فى قلبك لوم عاتبني
لو ظلمتك يوم حاسبني
يا حبيبي ازاى تسيبني نفسي تاني أعيش لقاك
بعد حبك مين ياخدني
مين هدوب ويدوب في حضني
ياللي كنت زمان واعدني
قولي إيه غير هواك

english.title: oh absent
text: oh absent and leaving me while my heart is with you
come back again even a second,and have mercy to my heart that loves you
if there is blaming in your heart then blame me
if i were cruel to you one day then give me accompt
oh my beloved how do you leave me i wish i can live seeing you again
who takes me after your love?
who will melt in my arms?
oh the one that were promising me before
tell me who changed your love
oh absent and leaving me while my heart is with you
come back again even a second,and have mercy to my heart that loves you
two days passed by us
and they've been like years
while we can't feel
come back, enough so far
i still dream of you
i'm still to you
no matter how much i live
you're the one inside me
so it was easy for you that i was lost in your hands
is that what we agreed about ?
how could you forget me?
so what's your heart's fault?
how could you vanquished it?
my hearts waits for it(ur heart) to come back to my arms

arabic.title: يانا يانتا
text: تيجي متجيش انا كده كده راضي
حبيبي مستني و هفضل انادي
بقول و بعيدلك والله قاعداك
حتعمل ايه بقي في واحد فاضي؟
يانا يانا يانتا بكره هتشوف
يانا يانتا والله لتشوف
حتيجي حتيجي مين يسيب حد كل ده بيهواه؟
يانا يانا يانتا و بكره اواريك
بعدك ده غلطه هتشوفها بعنيك
كل ده يا حبيبي وقت عالفاضي و احنا ضيعناه
سنه سنتين عشره مفيش فايده
قريب ولا بعيد ناري قايده
هتبعد اكتر كان غيرك اشطر
اشواقي مش بتقل دي زايده
يانا يانا يانتا بكره هتشوف
يانا يانتا والله لتشوف

english.title: It's Either Me Or You
text: if you come or not, I'm satisfied either way
my love, I'm waiting and I'll keep calling
I say and I repeat for you, I swear I'll repeat for you
what would you do with someone who has nothing else to do?
it's either me or you, and tomorrow you'll see
it's either me or you, I swear you'll see
you WILL come back, and tomorrow I'll show you
it's either me or you, and tomorrow I'll show you
your awayness is a mistake that you'll see with your own eyes
all that, my love, is time we wasted on nothing
a year, two year, ten, it's won't matter
either near or far, I'm on fire
you will go further? that won't do any good (expression)
my longings aren't decreasing, they're increasing
it's either me or you, and tomorrow you'll see
it's either me or you, I swear you'll see
you WILL come back, and tomorrow I'll show you
it's either me or you, and tomorrow I'll show you
your awayness is a mistake that you'll see with your own eyes
all that, my love, is time we wasted on nothing

arabic.title: يزلزل
text: سمع هنا قالوا عنه يزلزل
شوفته عجبني تقلت عليه
ع المستوى ده أنا عمري ما هنزل
بس أنا حفضل غالي ف عينيه
مش هقول تعالى
ليعيشها ويدخل في حالة
أنا ما اقدرش لا لا
مش حمسك فيه
معذور يا حبيبي
عندي طرقي وأساليبي
قالوا الصبر عيبي
شوفوا حعمل ايه
أنا من تحت لتحت أتغزل
أي صراحة دي بتيجي بعدين
ممكن ألم هدومي وأعزل
وأرجع لما يقول راح فين

english.title: Shakes/Unnerves
text: Her story reached up to here, they said she would shake (unnerve) you
I saw her, & liked her, so I played hard to get
From that level I would not go down
So I would still be precious in her eyes
I won't say come to me
So she won't believe it & play harder to get
I can't, no, no..
I'm not going to get that much attached to her
O my poor beloved
I have my ways & my methods
They said patience is my fault
Just see what I'm going to do
I without showing it admire her (in secret)
Any truth/honesty could come later.
I even can bag my stuff (clothes) & move home
And only return when she says where did he go!
